creator: heikki@info.nl
text:
I don't know if this is a bug or if I'm doing something wrong.

Trying to record a user session with the Proxy Server I do everything exactly 
like in the user guide, but nothing happens: no Url Samples are created under 
my SimpleController. Proxy is running (output
Initializing...
Creating Config Object...OK
Creating Cache Manager...OK
Creating Daemon Socket... port 8080 OK
).
However I'm behind a firewall; does that matter? and I have made no changes to 
my browser config, although the user guide says "Remember to reset your 
browser's proxy settings." all of a sudden at the end, without saying earlier 
what should be done there.
I tried mailing this to the mailing list but that was no succes either :( I'd 
appreciate any info on this mailed to heikki@info.nl Thanks in advance !

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
